mapper.select: SELECT python_idx , python_ver_idx , file_version , real_path , file_real_name , operating_system , description , md5_sum , CONCAT(ROUND(file_size/(1024*1024),2),"MB") AS file_size , create_at , c_emp_no , update_at , u_emp_no FROM python_windows WHERE python_ver_idx = 1

SELECT python_idx , python_ver_idx , file_version , real_path , file_real_name , operating_system , description , md5_sum , CONCAT(ROUND(file_size/(1024*1024),2),"MB") AS file_size , create_at , c_emp_no , update_at , u_emp_no FROM python_windows WHERE python_ver_idx = 2
